name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 23, Evergreen Group issued a statement to apologize for the incident in which the Paris Hotel did not hang the Chinese flag, saying that it would strengthen employee education and training to prevent similar incidents from happening again.
At the same time, it emphasized that the group recognized the 1992 Consensus and opposed Taiwan independence.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Teacher L is not your teacher"
On August 22, the media reported that Teacher L, a foreign spy, sponsored needy students to carry out espionage activities, encouraged them to take the civil service exam, and steal state secrets

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Shanghai, a Xiaohongshu netizen revealed that his company notified that "non-Han" employees need to report to the category manager. At present, the management level is upgraded, and minority employees are not allowed to be arranged in the store as much as possible.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a blogger revealed that more than a dozen students from an Internet addiction treatment school in Xiangyin, Hunan jointly reported that instructors in the school raped, molested, beat, and took nude photos of students.
On July 13, Zhang Enxu was kidnapped to Shengbo School in Xiangyin, Hunan by police disguised as police from the Internet addiction treatment school.
His friend reported the case immediately. After the police filed the case, they told his friends that he "lived very sunny." But in fact, Zhang Enxu suffered various abuses in the school.
Zhang Enxu did not stop resisting and wrote a joint report letter with other students in Shengbo School. According to his report letter, Shengbo School has instructors who raped, molested, beat, and took nude photos of students.
At present, the police have taken Zhang Enxu out of the school, but the other students who jointly reported seem to still be in Shengbo School.
The video caused an uproar among netizens. After the video was taken off the shelves, it was forwarded by netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to online information, six or seven media outlets and bloggers have reported in recent years that various corporal punishments and abuses occurred in Xiangyin County Shengbo School and the school network behind it. The school has changed its name many times, "changing its name as many times as the number of students who died"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to reports in public media information. In 2019 and 2023, the Xiangyin government investigated Shengbo School. 

In September 2019, the anti-gang squad of the Xiangyin County Public Security Bureau investigated the Yinggaote Special Training School and detained an instructor who abused students. 

In addition, according to the section chief surnamed Ni, Yinggaote Inspirational Education School and Hunan Zhongshan Vocational and Technical School have the same legal representative, Li Zheng.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 23, netizens discovered that eight of the hot searches on Weibo were related to the Indian rape case, and there was not a single hot search about Indian Prime Minister Modi’s visit to Ukraine.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 23, Chinese Premier Li Qiang arrived in Belarus for a visit. Slogans such as "A strong China means a strong Belarus" were displayed on the streets of the capital Minsk.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 22, Huixian County, Henan Province. It was reported online that a first-year female student at Mengzhuang Middle School died of heatstroke during military training. Her parents came to the school to deliver medicine but the security guards refused to let them in. On the 23rd, the family placed wreaths and banners in front of the school gate to defend their rights. The school said that the girl did not die during military training, and that it was not true that the parents were not allowed to enter the school to deliver medicine. The incident happened in the dormitory at around 5 a.m.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 24, the U.S. Embassy in China issued a statement:
On August 24, 1991, Ukraine became independent
On August 24, 2024, Ukraine is fighting to remain free.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 24, netizens wrote in saying that if they posted photos of the symposium commemorating the 120th anniversary of Comrade Deng Xiaoping’s birth on Toutiao, they would be banned and their accounts would not be able to appeal.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: News on August 23: Russian Ministry of Defense: The Russian and Chinese armies agreed to strengthen cooperation; on the 22nd, China and Russia issued a communiqué condemning the seizure of foreign assets and property and emphasizing the right to take countermeasures.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 21, Hangzhou, Zhejiang. The chairman of Taichang Group said in an interview: In recent years, the company has implemented a master-apprentice system, where apprentices need to give 5% of their monthly income to their masters, and then through the traditional Chinese cultural apprenticeship system, the apprentices will develop a sense of awe for their masters.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Wuxuan, Guangxi, it was reported that local Internet police discovered during their work that a man had posted an article on Toutiao that slandered national athlete Wu Yanni. The police quickly launched an investigation and the suspect has been detained.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a new Chinese Internet term "Lanweiwa" has sparked discussion. The meaning of this term is similar to that of an unfinished building, which means that after more than ten years of study, children become unemployed upon graduation, know nothing, achieve nothing, and even return to their hometown to rely on their parents to become "full-time children." Life is like an unfinished building, forced to stop!

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 21, Huoshan County, Anhui. The local area began to promote cremation last year. According to the Internet, a villager in Gufotang Village did not want his family member's body to be cremated, so on the day of the burial, the county leaders and hundreds of police officers forcibly seized the body. The two sides were deadlocked for several hours that day, during which the family members of the deceased were beaten by the police, and the body was eventually taken away and placed in the county funeral home.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens added that many factories have restrictions on the number of workers from the "four major ethnic groups" when recruiting.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the eve of the Paris Olympics, Chinese swimmer Pan Zhanle's endorsement of Nongfu Spring caused dissatisfaction among some netizens. Some netizens said, "The only shortcoming of Pan Zhanle is that he endorses Nongfu Spring."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 22, Chinese sociologist Yu Jianrong published an article questioning that Zhang Linlin was punished within the party on June 22, 2022 for arbitrarily assigning red codes to thousands of village bank depositors. According to regulations, the penalty period for government demotion is 24 months, during which she cannot be promoted. Therefore, if Zhang Linlin is reappointed to a position at the same level as her original position, it will constitute an illegal act.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 21, according to Gelonghui data: From January to July this year, China's private investment was 0% year-on-year, and the growth rate of private enterprise investment has dropped sharply from the high of 36.4% in February 2021 to 0%, reflecting the current lack of confidence in private investment. The media called for: Give the private economy a safe environment!

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 23, the Weibo topic #Grassroots is very busy why the masses don't buy it# became a hot search, sparking widespread heated discussion among netizens. One netizen replied, "You are busy carving flowers on shit, how can you expect the masses to praise it for being beautiful and fragrant?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
17-year-old anchor collapsed in live broadcast room and died after being sent to hospital 
August 23 (released) Nanjing, Jiangsu. Xiaoxin (pseudonym) said that his 17-year-old brother joined a media company as an anchor this year. On the morning of March 4, his brother said on the phone that "the work is very tiring and he is panicking." At about 5:50 pm that day, his brother suddenly died during the live broadcast. Afterwards, the company evaded responsibility and even arrogantly said, "You can sue me, it's not me who caused his sudden death."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Polar reversal!
In 2018, someone on Zhihu asked "How stupid can a person be?" One netizen answered "My brother is waiting for the house price to drop." Some netizens mocked that waiting for the house price to drop is just an excuse, and they don't even have the money for the down payment. Today in 2024, netizens are back here again "It's 2024, your brother was right that year"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens said that two truck drivers were sentenced to four years in prison for failing to report their trip to the epidemic area during the epidemic, and Zhang Linlin, who gave red codes to thousands of depositors, was promoted to the head of the Zhengzhou Culture and Tourism Bureau two years later.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 10, Langfang, Hebei. Someone was drowning in Yongding River in Gu'an. Luan Liuwei rushed into the river to save people after hearing the cry for help. He rescued three drowning children and died heroically due to exhaustion. His wife said: That day was their daughter's third birthday.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of August 23, in Du'an Yao Autonomous County, Guangxi, police officer Li Xie was rescuing a girl who attempted suicide in Chengjiang River, Anyang Town. Due to the rapid current, Li Xie pushed the girl to the river bank and died due to exhaustion. Many netizens criticized the girl for pushing the police officer away in the comment section.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 24 (Released) Liaoning. The urban management officers were loading the goods placed outside the store into a truck. The onlookers pleaded for the merchants. One woman stood up and questioned the urban management officers: You are bullying the common people, you are like bandits, I want to file a complaint against you!

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On August 23, high school teachers in Guangdong Province were notified that students were required to download the "Smart Primary and Secondary School" APP.
The notice mentioned that this was a "national task" promoted by the Central Audiovisual Education Center and the Provincial Department of Education.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The deadline for feedback on the "Draft for Soliciting Opinions on Internet Certificates and Internet Numbers" is tomorrow (August 25).

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
August 20, Beijing. The blogger spent 100 yuan to invite the delivery man to eat at the cleanest restaurant nearby. The rider replied: There is none here.
August 21, Qingdao, Shandong. The same rhetoric, the delivery man thought hard and replied "I really can't think of it"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Housing pension is coming
On August 23, at a press conference held by the General Office of the State Council, Dong Jianguo, Vice Minister of the Ministry of Housing and Urban-Rural Development, announced that 22 cities including Shanghai are piloting the housing pension system.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 23, Beijing. A lawyer posted a video saying, "I never thought the court's phone would have an anti-recording function." The lawyer believes that the law should be fair, just and open. The communication between the court and the lawyer should be open and aboveboard. Why is the court so afraid of recording?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 24, at the morning market in Changchun, Jilin, a vegetable farmer told the urban management that he would not live for many days, and he would drag two people down with him every day. He had no other choice. He spent 10,800 yuan to buy the account, and now you don’t let me sell it. Even though I am sick, I can still kill you with bricks. Netizens said that in the past, vegetable farmers could sell vegetables freely, which was very prosperous and convenient for the people, but they were suddenly restricted in the past few days and were not allowed to sell.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the game "Black Myth: Wukong" has been pointed out by many people as suspected plagiarism. On August 22, Xuanyu 108 posted a comparison of Yang Jian's arm in "Black Myth: Wukong" and his previous arm designs, lamenting: It has been plagiarized again. Is it so difficult to be original?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 24, Chinese painting blogger Li Yunzhong responded by saying that he had never said that Black Myth was plagiarized. "I only said it was borrowed. It is normal to borrow from excellent works in the field of art."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
August 24, Guangzhou Baiyun
A SF Express deliveryman hit a Raptor SUV in the wrong direction. He rushed towards passing vehicles and committed suicide, possibly because he was worried about not being able to pay the compensation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @wuyuesanren I am also very confused
